message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000, which is a great deal considering its value to you is $15000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with a price of $11000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $15000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit too far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with a price of $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $10000, not $15000 as you mentioned earlier.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to go up to $9800, but no further. I believe this is the maximum amount I'm willing to pay for the product.

I'm not willing to go up to $12000. I'm making a final offer of $9800. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to walk away and explore other options, including buying from John for $15000.
